---

|Column|Description|Potential Responses|
|---------|-----------|-------------------|
|Sandwich|Answers the Question: Is a hotdog a sandwich?"|Y or N: "Yes" indicates that the participant believes a hotdog is a sandwich. "No" indicates that the participant believes a hotdog is not a sandwich. |
|Year     |Answers the Question: What  year are you?|String: "First-Year", "Second-Year", "Third-Year", "Fourth-Year", "Graduate Student"|
|Source|What survey is the data collected from?|String e.g. "First YikYak Survey"|
